recipes.title: Chicken Stew
recipes.description: Looking for a hearty, healthy dinner? This chicken stew takes under an hour, but it tastes like it's been simmering on the stove for hours. Serve with a hearty piece of toasted

content.text: Looking for a hearty, healthy dinner? This chicken stew takes under an hour, but it tastes like it's been simmering on the stove for hours. Serve with a hearty piece of toasted

In a large pot over medium heat, melt butter. Add carrots and celery and season with salt and pepper. Cook, stirring often, until vegetables are tender, about 5 minutes. Add garlic and cook until fragrant, about 30 seconds.

Add flour and stir until vegetables are coated, then add chicken, thyme, bay leaf, potatoes, and broth. Season with salt and pepper. Bring mixture to a simmer and cook until the chicken is no longer pink and potatoes are tender, 15 minutes.

Remove from heat and transfer chicken to a medium bowl. Using two forks, shred chicken into small pieces and return to pot. 
Garnish with parsley before serving.

Deklaracja funkcji async definiuje funkcję asynchroniczną, która zwraca obiekt  AsyncFunction (en-US). Funkcja asynchroniczna to funkcja, która działa asynchroniczne poprzez zdarzenie pętli używając bezwarunkowego Promise do zwrócenia wyniku. Składnia i struktura kodu używanego przy funkcjach asynchronicznych jest jednakże bardziej podobna do znanych ze standardowych funkcji synchronicznych.

Możesz zdefiniować funkcje asynchroniczne również poprzez użycie async function expression (en-US).

ideas.title: Wim Hof's breathing method
ideas.description: Wim Hof is known from his unhuman skill of cold resistance. Climbing mountains just in shorts and boots, sitting in ice for hours without getting hypothermia are just few examples of his usual activities.

content.text: Wim Hof is known from his unhuman skill of cold resistance. Climbing mountains just in shorts and boots, sitting in ice for hours without getting hypothermia are just few examples of his usual activities.

Hof is teaching people around the globe how to control inner immune system with breathing techniques and controlled increasing exposure on cold. Those two factors done regularly help to improve overall organizm capabilities and resistance. Here I describe just procedure for breathing part, but integral part of the method is exposure on cold e.g. cold shower right after finished session.

cells.value: strong breath in and breath out
when you are feeling that cannot take more - try to keep few seconds extra
Keep it for 10-20 seconds. Quite pleasant isn't it?

content.text: Those exercises may even cause feinting - it is not dangerous as long you are in safe enviroment e.g in your bed. It is highly risky to perform above excercises while driving, swimming etc.
